com.mpos.lottery.te.trans.domain.logic

接口 ReversalOrCancelStrategy

  • 所有已知子接口:
    CompositeTicketService, PrizeService, PrizeService
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractPrizeService, AbstractReversalOrCancelStrategy, AbstractTicketService, BatchValidationReversalStrategy, BingoPrizeService, BingoSaleService, CashoutOperatorCancellation, DefaultCashoutService, DefaultCreditService, DefaultPlayerTopupService, DefaultVoucherService, DigitalPrizeService, DigitalSaleService, DownloadOfflineTicketServiceImpl, ExtraBallPrizeService, ExtraBallTicketService, IncomeBalanceServiceImpl, InstantSellReversalStrategy, LfnPrizeService, LfnSaleService, LottoPrizeServiceImpl, LottoTicketServiceImpl, Magic100PrizeServiceImpl, Magic100SaleService, OperatorTopupReversalStrategy, RafflePrizeService, RaffleTicketService, ToToPayoutServiceImpl, ToToTicketServiceImpl, UnionPrizeServiceImpl, UnionTicketServiceImpl, ValidateReversalStrategy, VatCreditServiceImpl, VatReversalOrCancelStrategy

    public interface ReversalOrCancelStrategy
    Any transactions if it can be reversed or cancelled by transaction(not cancel by ticket) can has a corresponding ReversalOrCancelStrategy. As reversal and cancel by transaction fall in same semantics, both are responsible of undoing previous transaction, we don't need to define 2 separated interfaces.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean cancelOrReverse(Context<?> respCtx, Transaction targetTrans)
      Cancel the target transaction.
      RoutineKey supportedReversalRoutineKey()
      Determine what kind of transaction will be cancelled/reversed by the concrete ReversalOrCancelStrategy implementation.

    • 方法详细资料

      • cancelOrReverse

        boolean cancelOrReverse(Context<?> respCtx,
                      Transaction targetTrans)
                        throws ApplicationException
        Cancel the target transaction.
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of cancellation request.
        targetTrans - The transaction which is intended to be cancelled.
        返回:
        true if cancel declined, or false.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • supportedReversalRoutineKey

        RoutineKey supportedReversalRoutineKey()
        Determine what kind of transaction will be cancelled/reversed by the concrete ReversalOrCancelStrategy implementation.
